title: The General: Commanding the Poly-Algo Squad
summary: Brute force is a blunt instrument. To conquer 60-digit composites, we need a tactical squad. Introducing 'The General,' a multi-threaded factorization command center.

title: Forging Code on the Open Road
summary: Why a truck driver is using AI to build number theory tools. The philosophy behind the studio.

title: Newton's Dice
summary: Early tests of the 2D physics engine. Collision detection is stable, but the bounce damping needs tuning.
